data.text:
@jakovanrensburg FYI, 2-step-verification is not something the other bureaus even offer. I personally have 2-step active on every account that offers it because of who I am. However, it may irritate someone to have to do it every time. Can you not save the browser ID like all the other people do it? That way, if a new browser tries to login with their credentials, it will ask for the code.

@stefanbar @yasserogier @willemhuman @cobuspienaar
